Package simplenlg.realiser

Class Summary
AggregatePhraseSpec  
AnchorString AnchorString contains a String and an Anchor.
CoordinateNPPhraseSpec This class represents a coordinate Noun Phrase consisting of: An arbitrary number of coordinates A Conjunction.
CoordinateVerbGroupSpec This is the class for Coordinated verb phrases.
NPPhraseSpec NPPhraseSpec is a very simple syntactic representation of a noun phrase.
PhraseSpec PhraseSpec represents a phrase specification
PPPhraseSpec PPPhraseSpec - represent a prepositional phrase.
Realiser Realiser converts a text spec into text or HTML.
RefSpec RefSpec is a Proto-phrase-spec for a reference to a KB entity.
Spec Spec - parent class for all TextSpec and PhraseSpec
SPhraseSpec simplenlg.SPhraseSpec is a simple syntactic representation of a sentential phrase.
StringPhraseSpec  
SyntaxPhraseSpec  
TextSpec simplenlg.TextSpec represents a text specification.
VerbGroupSpec This is the class that encapsulates a Verb Group (the part of the verb phrase containing a verb, and possibly an auxiliary verb phrase).
 

Enum Summary
DocStructure DocStructure is the document structure level.
